topics.body:
"@Virgil Stormblade":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b2eb1263687210740012fb#post_55b2eb1263687210740012fb

Depends on your stance on theoretical physics and what's more plausible for you.

Either time traveling to the past causes a divergence so you end up in an alternate reality in accordance to the choice you made. Or it's static and altering the past doesn't alter your timeline but alters the one you came back to leaving your present intact.
